basic_info.name: 徐一尧
basic_info.titles: 研发制造总监 | 供应链技术总监 | 智能制造设备工艺专家

objective.label: 求职意向
items: 研发制造总监 | 供应链技术总监
智能制造设备工艺专家 | 消费电子 NPI 负责人

basic_info.footer_text: 高精智能制造专家 | 16年行业经验

profile.summary: 16年高精智能制造专家，深耕3C消费电子（苹果核心供应链）与半导体后道封装领域。兼具消费类产品NPI全流程管控、DFM/MFD工艺优化、智能工厂规划落地及跨国跨职能团队管理经验。

cards.title: 技术统筹
cards.desc: 主导50+条高精密自动化产线NPI量产导入，推动2个智能工厂从0到1筹建。

cards.title: 核心业绩
cards.desc: 通过DFM优化、模块化设计与精益生产，实现OEE提升至85%+、产能提升90%+、良率稳定99.6%+。

cards.title: 战略管理
cards.desc: 擅长协同研发与供应商团队突破制造瓶颈，确保设计与制造无缝衔接。

card_groups.title: 技术专家视点
items: 3C / 半导体精密工艺（激光切割、PVD、HAF贴合等）
智能产线全流程架构设计
设备定位精度1-2μm、运动系统20g+加速度
热学组件装配工艺优化、散热结构DFM分析
系统装配公差分析（GD&T深化应用）

card_groups.title: 项目与运营
items: 自动化产线规划与量产导入
闭环数据管理系统搭建
OEE / 良率 / 成本优化
KISS原则落地（简化设计与制造流程）
SPC数据驱动的良率与成本优化

card_groups.title: 团队与领导力
items: 跨国跨职能团队管理（中/新/德）
敏捷开发 + Stage-Gate流程推行
供应商标准化开发体系构建
精益生产（单线流/模块化）落地
跨文化协同研发与供应商协作
组建并领导7+人跨职能团队

experience.role: 制造设计工程师 / 供应链技术负责人

projects.title: 阶段一：手机 / 手表制造（2019 - 至今）
details: 主导行业首个光固化低压注塑成型自动化产线开发，遵循KISS原则采用模块化+单线流简化设计，减少冗余工站，设备成本、占地面积及治具用量下降80%+，成功量产导入。
牵头框架组装标准化产线研发，集成贴膜、点胶等工艺，实现50μm内组装精度，CT提升76%、产能提升90%，自动化率90%+，良率稳定99.6%+。
主导光固化模块设计，通过光学结构优化与散热冷却系统精准匹配，实现光强均匀性与热能平衡控制，保障高效固化效果。
搭建基于SPC逻辑的闭环数据系统，推动设备预测性维护，产能爬坡周期从3-4周缩短至4天，良率从95%提升至99.6%。

projects.title: 阶段二：脆性材料精密工艺与自动化开发（2017 - 2019）
details: 创新研发蓝宝石带油墨镀膜激光切割工艺，通过独特光学结构和工艺流程实现激光成丝切割，精准控制受热断裂油墨区域≤0.1mm；主导搭建全自动化产线，人力节省80%+。
主导2个工厂超百条玻璃盖板产线自动化升级，创新20余种设备，人力节省10%+，生产一致性显著提升。
攻克蓝宝石组装工艺缺陷与产能瓶颈，通过优化热传递结构设计及工艺参数迭代，产能提升20%+，良率稳定至99%以上。
主导道路探伤机器人初代底盘和探伤模块开发，完成上路测试验证，奠定系列化产品技术基础。
负责集装箱爬壁、道路修补、探雷机器人等复杂系统设计，推动多项核心技术专利申请。
通过技术展示与客户洽谈，成功获取多个项目立项，实现技术到商业的转化。

experience.role: 机械工程师 / 研发经理

projects.title: 阶段一：独立研发项目组（成都，2014 - 2017）
details: 组建并领导7+人跨职能团队，推行敏捷开发+Stage-Gate流程，关键节点交付率100%。
支援德/新团队完成SIPLACE E/TX贴片机核心组件开发，实现30μm定位精度、4g加速度性能突破。
协作开发TCB/Laser Dicing设备对位系统，达成2μm超高对位精度。

projects.title: 阶段二：新加坡研发中心（2011 - 2014）
details: 负责SMT SPI设备机械设计，主导机架及流水线开发，协作完成15μm精度龙门对位系统和光学系统设计。
主导半导体焊线机自动化光学检测设备开发，为马来西亚客户定制交付。
协作开发SMT锡膏印刷设备，实现15μm级高精度对位；主导半导体封装微型晶圆曝光设备开发，达成1μm超精密对位。

projects.title: 阶段三：成都研发中心（2009 - 2011）
details: 负责CO₂/光纤激光器整机系统设计，攻克热学结构与精密光学装配难点，实现微米级激光打标工艺。
协作开发40吨/80吨封装注塑压力机，负责底盘结构与铰链设计。
引入自上而下的结构设计与参数化方法，实现多产品系列设计标准化，提升开发效率。
负责定制化特种切削刀具设计，独立完成零件图、装配图及工艺图纸全流程绘制。
参与从客户需求沟通到生产交付的全流程管理，开发新生产工艺与工装夹具，提升生产效率。
掌握产品研发至交付的全生命周期管理流程，奠定精密制造领域基础。

projects.title: 测试
details: 测试2

education.degree: 机械设计制造及其自动化 | 学士

hobbies.desc: 爱好动手实践，持续将DIY创新思维融入精密制造工艺优化。

basic_info.name: Xu Yiyao
basic_info.titles: R&D Manufacturing Director | Supply Chain Technical Director

objective.label: Career Objective
items: R&D Manufacturing Director | Supply Chain Technical Director
Smart Mfg Equipment Expert | Consumer Electronics NPI Lead

basic_info.footer_text: High-Precision Smart Manufacturing Expert | 16 Years Exp.

profile.summary: 16-year expert in high-precision smart manufacturing, specializing in 3C consumer electronics (Apple Core Supply Chain) and semiconductor backend packaging. Extensive experience in NPI lifecycle management, DFM/MFD process optimization, smart factory planning, and leading cross-functional international teams.

cards.title: Technical Leadership
cards.desc: Led NPI and mass production for 50+ high-precision automated lines; spearheaded the 0-to-1 establishment of two smart factories.

cards.title: Key Achievements
cards.desc: Optimized OEE to >85%, increased capacity by 90%, and stabilized yield at 99.6% through DFM, modular design, and Lean manufacturing.

cards.title: Strategic Management
cards.desc: Expert in bridging R&D and supplier teams to resolve manufacturing bottlenecks, ensuring seamless design-to-manufacturing transition.

card_groups.title: Technical Expertise
items: 3C / Semi Precision Process (Laser Cutting, PVD, HAF Lamination)
High Precision (1-2μm) & High Speed (20g+) Motion Systems
Thermal Assembly Optimization & Heat Dissipation DFM

experience.role: Manufacturing Design Engineer / Supply Chain Tech Lead

projects.title: Phase I: iPhone / Apple Watch Mfg (2019 - Present)
details: Led the industry's first UV low-pressure molding automation line. Applied KISS principle with modular & one-piece flow design, reducing redundancy. Cut equipment cost/footprint by 80%+.
Spearheaded frame assembly standardization (lamination/dispensing), achieving <50μm accuracy. Increased CT by 76%, capacity by 90%, automation >90%, and yield to 99.6%.
Led UV curing module design, optimizing optical structure and cooling systems to ensure uniform intensity and thermal balance.
Built an SPC-based closed-loop data system for predictive maintenance, shortening ramp-up from 3-4 weeks to 4 days and boosting yield from 95% to 99.6%.

projects.title: Phase II: Brittle Material Precision Process (2017 - 2019)
details: Innovated sapphire laser cutting process with ink coating. Achieved filament cutting with <0.1mm heat-affected zone. Automated line reduced labor by 80%.
Led automation upgrades for 100+ glass cover lines across 2 factories, innovating 20+ equipment types and improving consistency while cutting labor by 10%.
Resolved sapphire assembly defects and bottlenecks. Optimized thermal transfer structure and process parameters, boosting capacity by 20% and yield to >99%.
Led development of road inspection robot chassis and detection modules, completing road tests and establishing the technical foundation for the product series.
Designed complex systems including container wall-climbing, road repair, and mine-detection robots. Drove key patent applications.
Successfully secured multiple project initiations through technical demonstrations and client negotiations, converting technology into business value.

projects.title: Phase I: Independent R&D Team (Chengdu, 2014 - 2017)
details: Built and led a 7+ member cross-functional team, implementing Agile + Stage-Gate processes with 100% key milestone delivery rate.
Supported German/Singapore teams on SIPLACE E/TX core component development, achieving 30μm accuracy and 4g acceleration.
Collaborated on TCB/Laser Dicing equipment alignment systems, achieving 2μm ultra-high precision.

projects.title: Phase II: Singapore R&D Center (2011 - 2014)
details: Responsible for SMT SPI equipment mechanical design (frame & conveyor) and collaborated on 15μm gantry alignment and optical systems.
Led development of automated optical inspection for semiconductor wire bonders, delivering customized solutions for Malaysian clients.
Collaborated on SMT printing equipment (15μm alignment) and led micro-wafer exposure equipment development (1μm precision).

projects.title: Phase III: Chengdu R&D Center (2009 - 2011)
details: Designed CO₂/Fiber laser marking systems, resolving thermal structure and precision optical assembly challenges for micron-level marking.
Collaborated on 40T/80T encapsulation molding press development (chassis & toggle design).
Introduced top-down design and parametric methods, standardizing product series design and improving efficiency.
Designed customized special cutting tools, drafting full sets of part, assembly, and process drawings.
Managed full lifecycle from client communication to delivery, developing new processes and fixtures to improve efficiency.
Mastered the full R&D-to-delivery lifecycle, laying the foundation for precision manufacturing.

education.school: Southwest University of Science and Technology

hobbies.desc: Passionate about hands-on practice, continuously integrating DIY innovative thinking into precision manufacturing process optimization.
